room_title: Escape room "Find Casey Peace" by Escape Strategy in Tampa
room_address: 1312 Apollo Beach Blvd, Apollo Beach, FL 33572
room_description:
You’re all students at Bates High School. The word around school is that your friend Cassy committed suicide. While cleaning her locker you find a letter that says, “Meet at 1410 Kelley Gap Road at 4 pm.”
You and your friends decide to go and see what’s there. When you all get there, you realize it is an abandoned house, but you hear a voice coming from the basement. It`s the ghost of Cassy asking for your help. Her ghost tells you that it wasn’t suicide, that somebody murdered her. You have 60 minutes to help Cassy find peace before her spirit crosses over.
